points.title: The terms for this service are easy to read
points.status: The privacy policy has good spacing between lines, bolded words, and easily findable sections and sub-sections.

points.title: The service claims to be GDPR compliant for European users
points.status: In the privacy policy, there is a sub-section titled, "Your Rights Under General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR)"

points.title: Third parties used by the service are bound by confidentiality obligations
points.status: Privacy policy: "[Service Providers] have access to your Personal Data only to perform these tasks on our behalf and are obligated not to disclose or use it for any other purpose".

points.title: First-party cookies are used
points.status: Privacy policy: "We use cookies [...]"

points.title: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location
points.status: Privacy policy: "This Usage Data may include information such as your computer’s Internet Protocol address (e.g. IP address) [...]"

points.title: You can opt out of promotional communications
points.status: Privacy policy: "You may opt out of receiving any, or all, of these communications from us by following the unsubscribe link"

points.title: Many third parties are involved in operating the service
points.status: In the privacy policy, besides the usage of Google Analytics, Google's DART cookie, and social media cookies, it also states, "We may employ third party companies and individuals to facilitate our Service [...]", "We may use third-party Service Providers to automate the development process of our Service", and lists many different third-party advertisers on their site.

points.title: Your personal data is used for advertising
points.status: Privacy policy: "We use the information we collect in various ways, including to: [...] Personalise Advertisements as per your interests [...]"

points.title: Your personal data may be used for marketing purposes
points.status: Privacy policy: "We use the information we collect in various ways, including to: [...] for marketing and promotional purposes"

points.title: Third-party cookies are used for statistics
points.status: Privacy policy: "We use Google Analytics on our website [...]"

points.title: Your Personal data may be sold unless you opt out
points.status: Privacy policy: "However, under some circumstances, a transfer of personal information to a third party, or within our family of companies, without monetary consideration may be considered a 'sale' under California law. You are the only owner of your Personal Data and can request disclosure or deletion at any time. Please send an email here to opt out of your information being sold."

points.title: Do Not Track (DNT) headers are ignored and you are tracked anyway even if you set this header.
points.status: Privacy policy: "At this stage no uniform technology standard for recognizing and implementing DNT signals has been finalized. As such, we do not currently respond to DNT browser signals or any other mechanism that automatically communicates your choice not to be tracked online"

points.title: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation
points.status: Privacy policy: "To achieve the above stated purposes for which we process your personal data, we may have to share your personal data with certain third parties"

points.title: This service receives your precise location through GPS coordinates
points.status: Privacy policy: "We may also gather personal data by any of the following methods: [...] From platforms that make use of device settings that allow geographical location tracking, such as IP Address mapping, WiFi, GPS signals and cell tower positioning"

points.title: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting
points.status: Privacy policy: "GeeksforGeeks collects and shares your personal information through: [...] Beacons/Pixels/Tags"

points.title: Information is gathered about you through third parties
points.status: Privacy policy: "We collect some personal data from publicly accessible sources such as: Recruitment platforms"

points.title: Logs are kept for an undefined period of time
points.status: In the privacy policy, in a section about log files, they talk about how they use them, but it is never mentioned how long these log files are kept for.

points.title: Many different types of personal data are collected
points.status: Privacy policy: "While using our Service, we may also collect the following information: sex, age, date of birth, place of birth, passport details, citizenship, registration at place of residence and actual address, telephone number (work, mobile), details of documents on education, qualification, professional training, employment agreements, NDA agreements, information on bonuses and compensation, information on marital status, family members, social security (or other taxpayer identification) number, office location and other data"

points.title: A free help desk is provided
points.status: Privacy policy: "If you require any more information or have any questions about our privacy policy, please feel free to contact us by email at GeeksforGeeks"

points.title: The service claims to be CCPA compliant for California users
points.status: In the privacy policy, there is a section titled, "Your Rights under the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA)".

points.title: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data
points.status: Privacy policy: "You can ask for the deletion of your personal information"

points.title: Information is provided about how your personal data is used
points.status: In the privacy policy, there is a mini-section titled, "Use of Data".

points.title: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world
points.status: Privacy policy: "As a part of our standard business practices, we may transfer your personal data to organisations based in countries that have not been granted an adequacy decision under the General Data Protection Regulation"

points.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to you
points.status: In the privacy policy, it states, "Should we update, amend or make any changes to our privacy policy, those changes will be posted here". This is the only thing said about how updates of the privacy policy is done, implying that changes can happen at anytime and that you will not be notified when a change occurs.

points.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements
points.status: Privacy policy: "This Privacy Policy was last updated on : [date of last update]"

points.title: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder
points.status: Terms and Conditions: "If any term or condition of this Agreement is deemed invalid, void, or for any reason unenforceable, that part will be deemed severable and will not affect the validity and enforceability of any remaining term or condition"

points.title: This service assumes no responsibility and liability for the contents of links to other websites
points.status:
Privacy policy: "Our Service may contain links to other sites that are not operated by us. If you click a third party link, you will be directed to that third party’s site. We strongly advise you to review the Privacy Policy of every site you visit.

We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies or practices of any third party sites or services. You can choose to disable cookies through your individual browser options. To know more detailed information about cookie management with specific web browsers, it can be found at the browsers’ respective websites"

points.title: Information is provided about how they collect personal data
points.status: In the privacy policy, there is a sub-section titled, "Where do we obtain Personal Data from?"

points.title: This service is only available to users that are at least 18 years old
points.status: Privacy policy: "Our Services are not intended for use by children under the age of 18"

points.title: You are being tracked via social media cookies/pixels
points.status: Privacy policy: "GeeksforGeeks collects and shares your personal information through: [...] Social media cookies"

points.title: Your personal information is used for many different purposes
points.status:
Privacy policy: "We use the information we collect in various ways, including to:

    Provide, operate, and maintain our website

    Improve, personalise, and expand our website

    Understand and analyse how you use our website

    Develop new products, services, features, and functionality

    Communicate with you, either directly or through one of our partners, including for customer service, to provide you with updates and other information relating to the website, and for marketing and promotional purposes

    Send you emails

    Find and prevent fraud

    Personalise Advertisements as per your interests and send you marketing and promotional content via Phone Calls, WhatsApp and Email"

points.title: Third-party cookies are used for advertising
points.status: Privacy policy: "Advertising Cookies are used to serve you with advertisements that may be relevant to you and your interests"

points.title: The service informs you that its privacy policy does not apply to third party websites
points.status: Privacy policy: "We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies or practices of any third party sites or services"

points.title: You can opt out of providing personal information to third parties
points.status: Privacy policy: "You may request to opt out from future selling or sharing of your personal information to third parties"

points.title: Information is provided about what kind of information they collect
points.status: In the privacy policy, there is a sub-section titled, "What kinds of Personal Data do we Process?"

points.title: This service may collect, use, and share location data
points.status: Privacy policy: "We may use and store information about your location if you give us permission to do so (“Location Data”). We use this data to provide features of our Service, to improve and customise our Service"

points.title: Third-party software used and/or distributed by the service is provided 'as is' and to be used at your sole risk
points.status: Third Party Copyright Notices Document: "THE SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED 'AS IS', WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NONINFRINGEMENT". All other software in this document has the same "as is" statement.

points.title: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service
points.status: Privacy policy: "However, if you do not accept cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of our Service"
